option.name: KEEPGOING
option.description: Causes make to keepgoing on errors

option.name: SAVESPACE
option.description: Causes the removal of intermediate files

option.name: NO_DEBUG
option.description: Causes the toolchain not to generate debug tables

target.description: MSVC Compiler for Tools Release mode only

target.description: MinGW GCC Compiler for Tools Release mode only

target.name: CWTOOLS_REL
target.description: CodeWarrior Compiler for Tools Release mode only

target.name: GCCXML_REL
target.description: GCCXML for Code comparision tools release mode only
